description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission 16/00001/FUL dated 29/04/2016 for 'Addition of two storeys to existing four storey building to create six additional residential units (3 x 2 bedroom, 3 x 1 bedroom); two storey roof terrace  on front (western) elevation; additional windows to front (western), side (southern) and rear (eastern) elevations and additional cycle and waste storage  facilities (Amended Proposal Description). Variation includes an additional flat (1 x 2 bed) and use of roof level of building as seven individual roof terraces.
decision_conditions: The amendments are not considered to meet Council's criteria for "minor material" amendments as the additional two bedroom unit would significantly amend the proposed development and the proposed roof terraces could potentially introduce additional amenity impacts. Therefore the proposal does not represent a "minor material" change from the original planning permission with regard to Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). It is recommended that the the proposals would require submission of a new full planning application.
